data.message: Hello Facebook you need to put the chat column back like it was .Thats to narrow and  I keep clicking on to pictures when I am scrolling down the page to look at whats on facebook. I am not wanting to chat right now. Please put it back like it was.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Linda. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable at our feedback page: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo We appreciate it. -Hailey
